subtitle: Serve this tempting, fragrant curry dish with naan bread or rice.

method.text: Mix together the flour and spices. Toss in the quorn until well coated, shaking off any excess.
fMelt the butter in a large frying pan. Add the onion and pepper. Fry for about 5 min until softened. Add the celery, broccoli and quorn. Fry for 2 min.
Stir in the flour and spice mixture. Gradually blend in the milk. Cook gently, stirring until thickened and smooth.
Add the sultanas, apricots and mango chutney. Simmer for 10-15 min.

title: Indian spiced quorn with apricots
